page.title: 15SMEATHARPE - HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: The nearest doctor's surgery for the people of Smeatharpe is at Churchin- ford, over 2 kilometres away. There is a dispensary within the building where patients can obtain medicines. Four General Practitioners and a Nursing Sister are there on a rota basis five days a week. The main health centre in which they are based is at Hemyock, 9 kilometres from Smeatharpe. The Accident and Emergency Unit at East Reach Hospital, Taunton is the nearest Casualty Department. The town's other hospital, Musgrove, provides in-patient treatment, out- patient clinics, and maternity services. It is a tremendous problem for people, who do not have a car to get to doctor's surgery or hospital at short notice and have to rely on neighbours.
